interpretation: The "sandwich" card represents a coming together of different elements or ideas, creating something greater than the sum of its parts. It can signify the need for balance and harmony in your life, as well as the importance of compromise and collaboration in achieving your goals. This card may also suggest a time of nourishment and sustenance, whether that be in the form of physical nourishment or emotional support from loved ones. Be open to new ideas and perspectives, and trust that by working together, you can create something truly amazing. Keywords associated with this card include: collaboration, balance, harmony, nourishment, sustenance, compromise.
